page.title: 11Law and Order in Ditchling
page.content: The Ditchling Village 'Bobby' lives in the village and is also responsible for the hamlets of Streat and Westmeston.Lewes is the Sub_Divisional H.Q.and the Ditchling policeman covers the Wivelsfield policeman and vice_ versa.Ditchling was one of the first villages in the area to join the Crime Alert scheme which was set up in l984 to help the police in the detection of crime.Residents keep an eye on neigh_ bours' property,take note of cars or people behaving in a suspicious manner and feed relevant information back to the police,who in their turn inform the public of missing cars or of any undesirables known to be in the area. The number of burglaries in Ditchling has dropped significantly but this could be coincidence. Streat is plann_ ing to set up a similar scheme.
